verses.roman:
ei ślokārtha pūrve kariyāchi vyākhyāna
ślokera bhāvārtha kari saṅkṣepe ākhyāna

synonyms: ei śloka-artha—the meaning of this verse; pūrve—previously; kariyāchi—I have done; vyākhyāna—explanation; ślokera—of the same verse; bhāva-artha—purport; kari—I do; saṅkṣepe—in brief; ākhyāna—description.
translation: I have already explained this verse. Now I shall simply describe it in brief.

purport.content: In this connection, see Madhya-līlā, Chapter One, verses 53, 77-80 and 82-84.
